bug.author: honnibal
bug.summary: Parser, Tagger, NER still loaded when data missing
bug.description: If the data's not installed, these should not be added to the pipeline. Currently empty instances are being created. This explains the confusion in Issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/issues/565>#565</denchmark-link> and others.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
